channel.title: biberbrugg on d2h.net: flotsam, jetsam, & lagan
channel.description: Recent content in biberbrugg on d2h.net: flotsam, jetsam, & lagan

item.title: 16:00 back in einsiedeln
item.description: at lucerne verkehrshaus i disembark one station earlier than planned, trying to catch the voralpenexpress train back to biberbrugg. with a bit of, let’s say, fast-hobbling i manage to catch the train and am on my way back home. at biberbrugg i meet up with mrs d who has just been dropped of by fredi and is tired but happy from a fantastic day out. together we hop on to the train to einsiedeln and walk/hobble home picture links:
